Keywords: Avengers , Soldier , Spy , Wakanda
Real Name: Bucky Barnes
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) IT'S ACTUALLY WHITE WOLF: Winter Soldier starts the game with the Disney+ #s001 Super-Soldier Serum equipped.
I GOT A VIBRANIUM ARM, I CAN TAKE THEM: Close Combat Expert, Super Senses, Willpower.
I'M NOT A KILLER ANYMORE: Running Shot, Stealth. // Charge, but only if Winter Soldier occupies hindering terrain.

Comments
June 13, 2022
Oathful
The Quintessential Winter Soldier in my eyes, the only thing he lacks is the Hydra keyword (which is understandable at this point in the MCU). He is an offensive powerhouse at both close and ranged throughout his, and pairs well with the various Falcons and Sam Wilson Caps in this set. Traited Super Senses and token removal being improved with the Super Soldier Serum also help this guy stay on the map if your rolls are good. Thematic: 7.5/10 Viability: 8/10 (no +5), 9/10 (added +5) Fun Factor: 7/10, fairly balanced figure
May 31, 2022
Redrover454
Nothing game changing (on paper) here, just a phenomenal suite of powers and the numbers to make them work. RS + Pen/Psych from Stealth until he's based, CCE + Exploit whoever bases him. With traited SS and bottom dial Perplex, your opponent will really have to think twice before deciding to smack him, too. Bucky here is definitely that fig that you don't necessarily build around, but ends up on all your forces anyways.
May 7, 2022
Goop
I really like it when pieces have Psyblast and exploit weakness. It makes them very threatening no matter how you deal with him. He's got a lot of powers, great range, super willpower thanks to the serum. The stealth is what really makes him good, forces the close attack and then they have to deal with CCE/EW and CR later in dial. He's a well designed and thought out piece. Nothing really fancy other than standard powers but a great dial all around.
May 5, 2022
DarkTortoise23
...nobody gonna talk about how this guy has 9 powers top dial...? No? Fine, I'll do it myself. For the same cost as the ABPI Bucky that became a rockstar after the rules change, this guy does almost everything that one does and more. Definitely more suited to melee than that previous version(with 3 of the 9 POWERS HE HAS TOP DIAL being close combat expert, exploit, and charge), he's got the stealth and ranged capabilities to back up his melee focus and close distance. Pair him up with dudes that bring good team abilities (skrulls or avengers initiative come to mind) and he's one of the coolest super rares in the set. Really feels like a definitive winter soldier.
